Tucson barely has enough time to react but manages to leap up from the tree=
, and gains just enough air to perform a backwards vault over the shot that=
 Grimlock deployed, at the same time he clears the falling trees and lands =
with legs and feet spread wide enough for him to lower his body nearly to t=
he ground.  Yet the tip of his left wing still takes some damage, Tucson do=
es manage to literally dodge the bullet.

" Not bad, so close but yet so fa=
r.  So, Grimlock, what else do you have besides that fuel consuming energy =
weapon of yours?  Surely you've been upgraded with more sophisticated skill=
s other than what you have, don't you?"

He is quick to whirl the sword int=
o his hand.

" Big guns only shoot so far before they run out of power.  No=
w, let's try that again shall we?"

Perpetually on the move and constantly =
busy. 

On Sep 2, 2011, at 12:16 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...=
